title: Terror Tuesday: Extreme
originalTitle: อังคารคลุมโปง: เอ็กซ์ตรีม
overview: Inspired by the Thai horror radio show "Angkhan Khlumpong," this series presents eight stories based on real-life experiences shared by listeners.

tv.originalShowTitle: อังคารคลุมโปง: เอ็กซ์ตรีม
tv.episodeOverview: When a young man finds a sealed room in his new home and discovers its terrifying story, the horrors of the past slowly creep into his family's lives.
